verses.verse: וּבַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <WH7637> And in the seventh בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> on the first לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month מִֽקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> have לָכֶ֔ם כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> no servile לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ye shall do י֥וֹם <WH3117> it is a day תְּרוּעָ֖ה <WH8643> of blowing יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> have לָכֶֽם׃

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <WH6213> And ye shall offer עֹלָ֜ה <WH5930> a burnt offering לְרֵ֤יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5207> for a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD פַּ֧ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> young אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one אַ֣יִל <WH352> ram אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> one כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> old שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> [and] seven תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without blemish

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <WH4503> And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <WH6241> tenth deals לַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> for a bullock שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> [and] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֖ים <WH6241> tenth deals לָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> for a ram
וְעִשָּׂר֣וֹן <WH6241> tenth deal אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> And one לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> for one לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <WH7651> throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <WH3532> lambs
וּשְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> And one חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and

מִלְּבַד֩ <WH905> alone עֹלַ֨ת <WH5930> Beside the burnt offering הַחֹ֜דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month וּמִנְחָתָ֗הּ <WH4503> and his meat offering וְעֹלַ֤ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִיד֙ <WH8548> and the daily וּמִנְחָתָ֔הּ <WH4503> and his meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH5262> and their drink offerings כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑ם <WH4941> according unto their manner לְרֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> a sacrifice made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD ס

וּבֶעָשׂוֹר֩ <WH6218> And ye shall have on the tenth לַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <WH7637> [day] of this seventh הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> of this מִֽקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֔ם וְעִנִּיתֶ֖ם <WH6031> and ye shall afflict אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5315> your souls כָּל־ <WH3605> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> any work לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> ye shall not do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <WH7126> But ye shall offer עֹלָ֤ה <WH5930> a burnt offering לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> [for] a sweet פַּ֧ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> young אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one אַ֣יִל <WH352> ram אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> one כְּבָשִׂ֤ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> old שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year שִׁבְעָ֔ה <WH7651> [and] seven תְּמִימִ֖ם <WH8549> they shall be unto you without blemish יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> having לָכֶֽם׃

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <WH4503> And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <WH6241> tenth deals לַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> to a bullock שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> [and] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֔ים <WH6241> tenth deals לָאַ֖יִל <WH352> ram הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> to one
עִשָּׂרוֹן֙ <WH6241> A several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <WH6241> A tenth לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> for one לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <WH7651> throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <WH3532> lambs

שְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> One חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַ֞ד <WH905> alone חַטַּ֤את <WH2403> beside the sin offering הַכִּפֻּרִים֙ <WH3725> of atonement וְעֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> and the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> and the meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH5262> of it and their drink offerings פ

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁה֩ <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֨ר <WH6240> teen י֜וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> of the seventh מִֽקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֔ם כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> no servile לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ye shall do וְחַגֹּתֶ֥ם <WH2287> and ye shall keep חַ֛ג <WH2282> a feast לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <WH7126> And ye shall offer עֹלָ֜ה <WH5930> a burnt offering אִשֵּׁ֨ה <WH801> a sacrifice made by fire רֵ֤יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5207> of a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD פָּרִ֧ים <WH6499> bullocks בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the first בָקָ֛ר <WH1241> bull שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> three עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> old שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen תְּמִימִ֥ם <WH8549> they shall be without blemish יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> and their grain

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <WH4503> And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <WH6241> tenth deals לַפָּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock הָֽאֶחָ֗ד <WH259> unto every לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> three עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> ten פָּרִ֔ים <WH6499> bullocks שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> two עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <WH6241> tenth deals לָאַ֣יִל <WH352> ram הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> to each לִשְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> of the two הָאֵילִֽם׃ <WH352> rams

וְעִשָּׂרׅוֹן֙ <WH6241> And a several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <WH6241> tenth לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <WH3532> lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> to each לְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen כְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <WH3532> lambs

וּשְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> And one חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> beside the continual מִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> his meat offering וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering ס

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <WH8145> And on the second פָּרִ֧ים <WH6499> bullocks בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the first בָקָ֛ר <WH1241> bull שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> two עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> old שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without spot

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <WH4503> And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <WH5262> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <WH6499> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <WH352> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <WH4557> [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> after the manner

וּשְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> And one חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> beside the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> and the meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH5262> thereof and their drink offerings ס

וּבַיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֛י <WH7992> And on the third פָּרִ֥ים <WH6499> bullocks עַשְׁתֵּי־ <WH6249> eleven עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without blemish

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <WH4503> And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <WH5262> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <WH6499> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <WH352> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <WH4557> [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> after the manner

וּשְׂעִ֥יר <WH8163> goat חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> And one מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> beside the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> and his meat offering וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering ס

וּבַיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הָרְבִיעִ֛י <WH7243> And on the fourth פָּרִ֥ים <WH6499> bullocks עֲשָׂרָ֖ה <WH6235> ten אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without blemish

מִנְחָתָ֣ם <WH4503> Their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <WH5262> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <WH6499> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <WH352> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <WH4557> [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> after the manner

וּשְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> And one חַטָּ֑את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> beside the continual מִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> his meat offering וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering ס

וּבַיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הַחֲמִישִׁ֛י <WH2549> And on the fifth פָּרִ֥ים <WH6499> bullocks תִּשְׁעָ֖ה <WH8672> nine אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without spot

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <WH4503> And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <WH5262> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <WH6499> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <WH352> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <WH4557> [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> after the manner

וּשְׂעִ֥יר <WH8163> goat חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> And one מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> beside the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> and his meat offering וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering ס

וּבַיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הַשִּׁשִּׁ֛י <WH8345> And on the sixth פָּרִ֥ים <WH6499> bullocks שְׁמֹנָ֖ה <WH8083> eight אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without blemish

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <WH4503> And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <WH5262> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <WH6499> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <WH352> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <WH4557> [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> after the manner

וּשְׂעִ֥יר <WH8163> goat חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> [for] a sin offering אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> And one מִלְּבַד֙ <WH905> alone עֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> beside the continual מִנְחָתָ֖הּ <WH4503> his meat offering וּנְסָכֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5262> and his drink offering פ

וּבַיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֛י <WH7637> And on the seventh פָּרִ֥ים <WH6499> bullocks שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> seven אֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without blemish

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <WH4503> And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּהֶ֡ם <WH5262> and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <WH6499> for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <WH352> for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <WH4557> [shall be] according to their number כְּמִשְׁפָּטָֽם׃ <WH4941> after the manner
